unnormalised: Arre, AI taking over? As if! My grandma still forwards "Good Morning" images on WhatsApp, thinks it's actually good for her health. Saw some article saying AI can now write Bollywood scripts. LOL! Wonder if it can come up with something better than the last Salman Khan movie. Seriously though, 10 GB of training data wasted on that, AI might actually quit!
normalised: Are, A-I taking over? As if! My grandma still forwards "Good Morning" images on W-hats-A-pp, thinks it's actually good for her health. Saw some article saying A-I can now write B-ollywood scripts. L-O-L! Wonder if it can come up with something better than the last S-alman K-han movie. Seriously though, ten gigabyte of training data wasted on that, A-I might actually quit!
